00015 class TestFrameListener : public FrameListener
00016 {
00017 public:
00018     TestFrameListener(OIS::Keyboard *keyboard, OIS::Mouse *mouse, SceneManager *mgr, Camera *cam, RenderWindow * renderWindow)
00019         : m_Keyboard(keyboard), m_mouse(mouse), m_rotateNode(mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode()), m_cam(cam), 
00020         m_camHeight(0), m_camOffset(0), m_arena(30000), m_mgr(mgr),
00021         m_thirdPersonCam(true), m_renderModel(m_arena, m_mgr), mp_vp(cam->getViewport()), mp_fps(NULL), m_timer(0),
00022         mp_renderWindow(renderWindow), m_con(NULL), m_camParticle(NULL), m_camNode(NULL),
00023         mp_healthBar(NULL), mp_energyBar(NULL), mp_speedBar(NULL)
00024     {
00025         m_cam->setFarClipDistance(0);
00026 
00027         // Generate the keyboard testing entity and attach it to the listener's scene node
00028         SpaceShip playerShip = SpaceShip(ObjectType::SHIP, 1, Vector3(0, -2000, 0), 15);
00029         playerShip.addPlasmaCannon(PlasmaCannon());
00030         playerShip.addAnchorLauncher(AnchorLauncher());
00031         SpaceShip * p_playerShip = m_arena.setPlayerShip(playerShip);
00032 
00033         // Generate GUI elements
00034         Gorilla::Silverback * gorilla = Gorilla::Silverback::getSingletonPtr();
00035         Gorilla::Screen * screen = gorilla->createScreen(mp_vp, "dejavu");
00036         Gorilla::Layer * layer = screen->createLayer(10);
00037 
00038         layer->createCaption(14, 5, 5, "OreWar Alpha v0.02");
00039         Gorilla::Rectangle * crosshair = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(mp_vp->getActualWidth() / 2.0f - 6, mp_vp->getActualHeight() / 2.0f - 6),
00040             Vector2(12, 12));
00041         crosshair->background_image("crosshair");
00042 
00043         mp_fps = layer->createCaption(14, 5, mp_vp->getActualHeight() - 24, "FPS Counter");
00044 
00045         mp_healthBar = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(14, mp_vp->getActualHeight() - 66), Vector2(mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25, 12));
00046         mp_healthBar->background_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Red);
00047         mp_healthBar->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Red);
00048 
00049         Gorilla::Rectangle * healthBarBorder = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(14, mp_vp->getActualHeight() - 66), Vector2(mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25, 12));
00050         healthBarBorder->no_background();
00051         healthBarBorder->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Red);
00052         healthBarBorder->border_width(1);
00053 
00054         mp_energyBar = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(14, mp_vp->getActualHeight() - 82), Vector2(mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25, 12));
00055         mp_energyBar->background_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Blue);
00056         mp_energyBar->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Blue);
00057 
00058         Gorilla::Rectangle * energyBarBorder = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(14, mp_vp->getActualHeight() - 82), Vector2(mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25, 12));
00059         energyBarBorder->no_background();
00060         energyBarBorder->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Blue);
00061         energyBarBorder->border_width(1);
00062 
00063         mp_speedBar = layer->createRectangle(Vector2(14, mp_vp->getActualHeight() - 98), Vector2(mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25, 12));
00064         mp_speedBar->background_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Orange);
00065         mp_energyBar->border_colour(Gorilla::Colours::Orange);
00066 
00067         m_camNode = m_mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00068         m_camNode->attachObject(m_cam);
00069         m_cam->setPosition(0, 0, 0);
00070         m_camParticle = m_mgr->createParticleSystem("CamStars", "Orewar/CamStarField");
00071         m_camParticle->setEmitting(true);
00072         m_camNode->attachObject(m_camParticle);
00073     }
00074  
00075     bool frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt)
00076     {
00077         // Capture the keyboard input
00078         m_Keyboard->capture();
00079         SpaceShip * playerShip = m_arena.playerShip();
00080         SphereCollisionObject * playerShipPhys = playerShip->phys();
00081 
00082         // Add random NPC ships to shoot
00083         for(int i = 0; i < m_arena.npcShips()->size() - 6; i++) {
00084             // Add some NPC ships
00085             SpaceShip npcShip = SpaceShip(ObjectType::NPC_SHIP, 1, 
00086                 Vector3(Math::RangeRandom(0, m_arena.size()),
00087                 Math::RangeRandom(0, m_arena.size()),
00088                 Math::RangeRandom(0, m_arena.size())),
00089                 5);
00090             SphereCollisionObject * npcShipPhysics = npcShip.phys();
00091             // npcShip.velocity(Vector3(0, 0, 0));
00092             npcShipPhysics->velocity(Vector3(Math::RangeRandom(0, 2000),
00093                 Math::RangeRandom(0, 2000),
00094                 Math::RangeRandom(0, 2000)));
00095 
00096             npcShipPhysics->orientation(Vector3(0, 0, -1).getRotationTo(npcShipPhysics->getVelocity()));
00097             m_arena.addNpcShip(npcShip);
00098         }
00099 
00100         // Adjust or reset the camera modifiers
00101         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_Z)) {
00102             m_camHeight = 0;
00103             m_camOffset = 0;
00104         }
00105         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_UP)) {
00106             m_camHeight += 2;
00107         }
00108         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_DOWN)) {
00109             m_camHeight -= 2;
00110         }
00111         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_RIGHT)) {
00112             m_camOffset += 2;
00113         }
00114         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_LEFT)) {
00115             m_camOffset -= 2;
00116         }
00117 
00118         // Mouse control
00119         m_mouse->capture();
00120         playerShipPhys->pitch(Radian(m_mouse->getMouseState().Y.rel * -0.25 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00121         playerShipPhys->yaw(Radian(m_mouse->getMouseState().X.rel * -0.25 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00122         
00123         // Clear all existing forces, and add keyboard forces
00124         Real energyDrain = 10;
00125         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_W)) {
00126             playerShipPhys->applyTempForce(playerShipPhys->heading() * Real(2000));
00127             playerShip->drainEnergy(energyDrain * evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00128         }
00129         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_S)) {
00130             playerShipPhys->applyTempForce(playerShipPhys->heading() * Real(-2000));
00131             playerShip->drainEnergy(energyDrain * evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00132         }
00133         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_A)) {
00134             playerShipPhys->applyTempForce((playerShipPhys->orientation() * Quaternion(Degree(90), Vector3::UNIT_Y)) 
00135                 * Vector3(0, 0, -1500));
00136             playerShip->drainEnergy(energyDrain * evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00137         }
00138         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_D)) {
00139             playerShipPhys->applyTempForce((playerShipPhys->orientation() * Quaternion(Degree(-90), Vector3::UNIT_Y)) 
00140                 * Vector3(0, 0, -1500));
00141             playerShip->drainEnergy(energyDrain * evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00142         }
00143 
00144         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_Q)) {
00145             playerShipPhys->roll(Radian(2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00146         }
00147         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_E)) {
00148             playerShipPhys->roll(Radian(-2 * evt.timeSinceLastFrame));
00149         }
00150 
00151         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_LCONTROL)) {
00152             playerShipPhys->applyTempForce(playerShipPhys->getVelocity().normalisedCopy() * (-1) * Vector3(2000, 2000, 2000));
00153             playerShip->drainEnergy(energyDrain * evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00154         }
00155 
00156         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_C)) {
00157             m_thirdPersonCam = !m_thirdPersonCam; 
00158         }
00159 
00160         // Generate projectile if required
00161         if(m_mouse->getMouseState().buttonDown(OIS::MB_Left)) {
00162             m_arena.fireProjectileFromShip(playerShip, 0);
00163         }
00164 
00165         if(m_mouse->getMouseState().buttonDown(OIS::MB_Right)) {
00166             m_arena.fireProjectileFromShip(playerShip, 1);
00167         }
00168 
00169         // Generate constraint - TESTING
00170         if(m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_RCONTROL) || m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_SPACE))
00171         {
00172             if(m_con == NULL) 
00173             {
00174                 Projectile * closestAnchor = NULL;
00175                 for(std::vector<Projectile * >::iterator projIter = m_arena.projectiles()->begin(); 
00176                     projIter != m_arena.projectiles()->end();
00177                     projIter++) 
00178                 {
00179                     if((*projIter)->type() != ANCHOR_PROJECTILE) {
00180                         continue;
00181                     }
00182 
00183                     if(closestAnchor == NULL ||
00184                         (playerShipPhys->position().squaredDistance((*projIter)->phys()->position()) <
00185                         playerShipPhys->position().squaredDistance(closestAnchor->phys()->position()))) 
00186                     {
00187                         closestAnchor = *projIter;
00188                     }
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 if(closestAnchor != NULL) {
00192                     closestAnchor->phys()->velocity(Vector3(0, 0, 0));
00193                     m_con = m_arena.addConstraint(Constraint(playerShip->phys(), 
00194                         closestAnchor->phys()));
00195                 }
00196             }
00197         } else {
00198             if(m_con != NULL) {
00199                 PhysicsObject * deadAnchor = m_con->getTarget();
00200                 m_arena.destroyConstraint(m_con);
00201                 for(std::vector<Projectile * >::iterator projIter = m_arena.projectiles()->begin(); 
00202                     projIter != m_arena.projectiles()->end();
00203                     projIter++) 
00204                 {
00205                     if((*projIter)->phys() == deadAnchor) {
00206                         m_arena.destroyProjectile(*projIter);
00207                         break;
00208                     }
00209                 }
00210                 m_con = NULL;
00211             }
00212         }
00213 
00214         // Update FPS counter
00215         m_timer += evt.timeSinceLastFrame;
00216         if (m_timer > 1.0f / 60.0f) 
00217         {
00218             m_timer = 0;
00219             mp_fps->text("FPS: " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(mp_renderWindow->getLastFPS())
00220                 + " - RenderObjects: " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(m_renderModel.getNumObjects())
00221                 + " - Health: " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(playerShip->health())
00222                 + " - Speed: " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString(playerShipPhys->getVelocity().length())
00223                 + " - Force: " + Ogre::StringConverter::toString((playerShipPhys->sumForces() + playerShipPhys->sumTempForces()).length()));
00224         }
00225 
00226         // Update UI
00227         mp_healthBar->width((mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25) * (playerShip->health() / playerShip->maxHealth()));
00228         mp_energyBar->width((mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25) * (playerShip->energy() / playerShip->maxEnergy()));
00229         mp_speedBar->width((mp_vp->getActualWidth() * 0.25) * (playerShipPhys->getVelocity().length() / Real(6000)));
00230 
00231         // Update the position of the physics object and move the scene node
00232         m_arena.updatePhysics(evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00233         m_renderModel.updateRenderList(evt.timeSinceLastFrame, m_camNode->getOrientation());
00234 
00235         // Move the camera
00236         if(m_thirdPersonCam) {
00237             m_camNode->setPosition(playerShipPhys->position() + Vector3(0, 1000, 1000));
00238             m_camNode->lookAt(playerShipPhys->position(), Node::TS_WORLD);
00239         } else {
00240             m_camNode->setPosition(playerShipPhys->position() + playerShipPhys->normal() * 80 - playerShipPhys->heading() * 200);
00241             m_camNode->setOrientation(playerShipPhys->orientation());
00242         }
00243 
00244         return !m_Keyboard->isKeyDown(OIS::KC_ESCAPE);
00245     }
00246  
00247 private:
00248     OIS::Keyboard *m_Keyboard;
00249     OIS::Mouse *m_mouse;
00250     SceneNode *m_rotateNode;
00251     Camera *m_cam;
00252     int m_camHeight;
00253     int m_camOffset;
00254     GameArena m_arena;
00255     bool m_thirdPersonCam;
00256 
00257     SceneManager * m_mgr;
00258     RenderModel m_renderModel;
00259     Viewport * mp_vp;
00260     Gorilla::Caption * mp_fps;
00261     Real m_timer;
00262     RenderWindow * mp_renderWindow;
00263     Constraint * m_con;
00264     ParticleSystem * m_camParticle;
00265     SceneNode * m_camNode;
00266 
00267     Gorilla::Rectangle * mp_healthBar;
00268     Gorilla::Rectangle * mp_energyBar;
00269     Gorilla::Rectangle * mp_speedBar;

00272 class Application
00273 {
00274 public:
00275     void go()
00276     {
00277         createRoot();
00278         defineResources();
00279         setupRenderSystem();
00280         createRenderWindow();
00281         initializeResourceGroups();
00282         setupScene();
00283         setupInputSystem();
00284         createFrameListener();
00285         startRenderLoop();
00286     }
00287  
00288     ~Application()
00289     {
00290         mInputManager->destroyInputObject(mKeyboard);
00291         OIS::InputManager::destroyInputSystem(mInputManager);
00292         delete mListener;
00293         delete mRoot;
00294     }
00295  
00296 private:
00297     Root *mRoot;
00298     SceneManager* mMgr;
00299     OIS::Keyboard * mKeyboard;
00300     OIS::Mouse * mMouse;
00301     OIS::InputManager *mInputManager;
00302     TestFrameListener *mListener;
00303  
00304     void createRoot()
00305     {
00306         // Generate the OGRE Root object
00307         #ifdef _DEBUG
00308             mRoot = new Root("plugins_d.cfg");
00309         #else
00310             mRoot = new Root("plugins.cfg");
00311         #endif
00312     }
00313  
00314     void defineResources()
00315     {
00316         String secName, typeName, archName;
00317         
00318         // Load the resources.cfg resource definition file
00319         ConfigFile cf;
00320 
00321         #ifdef _DEBUG
00322             cf.load("resources_d.cfg");
00323         #else
00324             cf.load("resources.cfg");
00325         #endif
00326 
00327         // Loop through all the provided resource folders and add them
00328         // to the ResourceGroupManager
00329         ConfigFile::SectionIterator seci = cf.getSectionIterator();
00330         while (seci.hasMoreElements())  {
00331             // Loop through the provided sections
00332             secName = seci.peekNextKey();
00333             ConfigFile::SettingsMultiMap *settings = seci.getNext();
00334             ConfigFile::SettingsMultiMap::iterator i;
00335     
00336             for (i = settings->begin(); i != settings->end(); ++i) {
00337                 // Add each provided directory path to the GroupResourceManager
00338                 typeName = i->first;
00339                 archName = i->second;
00340                 ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().addResourceLocation(archName, typeName, secName);
00341             }
00342         }
00343     }
00344  
00345     void setupRenderSystem()
00346     {
00347         // Restore the last configuration settings, or provide a dialogue if no prior
00348         // settings are stored
00349         //if (!mRoot->restoreConfig() && !mRoot->showConfigDialog()) // Only show config if no existing config is found
00350         if (!mRoot->showConfigDialog()) // Always show config
00351             throw Exception(52, "User canceled the config dialog!", "Application::setupRenderSystem()");
00352     }
00353  
00354     void createRenderWindow()
00355     {
00356         // Create the render window (first parameter determines whether OGRE should generate
00357         // the render window)
00358         mRoot->initialise(true, "Ore War");
00359     }
00360  
00361     void initializeResourceGroups()
00362     {
00363         // Mipmaps setting must be set before resource groups are initialized
00364         TextureManager::getSingleton().setDefaultNumMipmaps(5);
00365         ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseAllResourceGroups();
00366     }
00367  
00368     void setupScene()
00369     {
00370         // Create the SceneManager
00371         SceneManager *mgr = mRoot->createSceneManager(ST_GENERIC, "Default SceneManager");
00372 
00373         // Initialize Gorilla
00374         Gorilla::Silverback * gorilla = new Gorilla::Silverback();
00375         gorilla->loadAtlas("dejavu");
00376         
00377         // Setup ambient light and shadows
00378         mgr->setShadowTechnique(Ogre::SHADOWTYPE_TEXTURE_ADDITIVE);
00379         mgr->setAmbientLight(Ogre::ColourValue(0.4, 0.4, 0.5));
00380 
00381         // Create a camera
00382         Camera *cam = mgr->createCamera("Camera");
00383         cam->setPosition(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,1000));
00384         cam->lookAt(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,0));
00385 
00386         // Create a viewport
00387         Viewport *vp = mRoot->getAutoCreatedWindow()->addViewport(cam);
00388         cam->setAspectRatio(Real(vp->getActualWidth()) / Real(vp->getActualHeight()));
00389 
00390         // Add planes for the arena boundaries
00391         mgr->setSkyBox(true, "Orewar/SpaceSkyBox", 40000, true);
00392 
00393         // Put a star in the middle of the arena
00394         SceneNode * starNode = mgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode();
00395         Entity * starEntity = mgr->createEntity("Sphere", "sphere.mesh");
00396         starEntity->setMaterialName("Orewar/Star");
00397         starNode->attachObject(starEntity);
00398         starNode->setScale(15, 15, 15);
00399         
00400         Light * starLight = mgr->createLight("StarLight");
00401         starLight->setType(Ogre::Light::LT_POINT);
00402         starLight->setDiffuseColour(0.9, 0.6, 0.05);
00403         starLight->setSpecularColour(1, 1, 1);
00404         starLight->setAttenuation(40000, 1.0, 0.007, 0.00014);
00405         starLight->setCastShadows(false);
00406         starNode->attachObject(starLight);
00407     }
00408  
00409     void setupInputSystem()
00410     {
00411         // Initialize OIS
00412         size_t windowHnd = 0;
00413         std::ostringstream windowHndStr;
00414         OIS::ParamList pl;
00415         RenderWindow *win = mRoot->getAutoCreatedWindow();
00416  
00417         win->getCustomAttribute("WINDOW", &windowHnd);
00418         windowHndStr << windowHnd;
00419         pl.insert(std::make_pair(std::string("WINDOW"), windowHndStr.str()));
00420         mInputManager = OIS::InputManager::createInputSystem(pl);
00421 
00422 
00423         // Setup (Unbuffered in this case) input objects
00424         try {
00425             mKeyboard = static_cast<OIS::Keyboard*>(mInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISKeyboard, false));
00426             mMouse = static_cast<OIS::Mouse*>(mInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISMouse, false));
00427             //mJoy = static_cast<OIS::JoyStick*>(mInputManager->createInputObject(OIS::OISJoyStick, false));
00428         }
00429         catch (const OIS::Exception &e) {
00430             throw Exception(42, e.eText, "Application::setupInputSystem");
00431         }
00432     }
00433  
00434     void createFrameListener()
00435     {
00436         // Create and add a listener for the keyboard
00437         // Note: Input devices can have only one listener
00438         mListener = new TestFrameListener(mKeyboard, mMouse, mRoot->getSceneManager("Default SceneManager"), 
00439             mRoot->getSceneManager("Default SceneManager")->getCamera("Camera"),
00440             mRoot->getAutoCreatedWindow());
00441         mRoot->addFrameListener(mListener);
00442     }
00443  
00444     void startRenderLoop()
00445     {
00446         mRoot->startRendering();
00447     }

00471 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32

00473 #else

00475                     e.getFullDescription().c_str() << std::endl;
00476 #endif
00477             }
